code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Article(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:" Chess is a timeless strategy board game that originated in northern India over a thousand years ago. The objective is to checkmate your opponent's king, meaning the king is in a position to be captured ('in check') and there is no way to move the king out of capture ('mate').
